question: 罰金
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Penalty</kanji> <kanji>gold</kanji> is the money you pay when you get a penalty. It's for <vocabulary>a fine</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. The <ja>ばつ</ja> gets changed to <ja>ばっ</ja> though, so don't get it wrong (or you'll get a <ja>罰金</ja>!).
